item.title: About me
item.author: Author
item.description: Hi, I’m Thomas ðŸ‘‹ Welcome to my personal website. I run a small digital marketing agency called Community Digital where we help charities, social enterprises and mission-driven organisations to create better digital products and services. If you represent a nonprofit who is looking for an outsourecd digital team, please get in touch. I am launching this website to improve my writing, learn in public and publish online without the constraints of brand guidelines.
